summary: Allow setting search attributes in dev server startup options for the Ruby SDK, translating them to --search-attribute CLI calls to align with recent CLI improvements.
userImpact: Users can now configure search attributes directly in dev server startup options instead of managing them separately through CLI calls.
proposedFix: Add support for accepting search attributes in dev server startup options that translate to --search-attribute CLI parameters.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented to accept search attributes in dev server startup options.
keyQuote: users should be allowed to set search attributes in dev server option that translate to `--search-attribute` calls
